turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was wanting to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about the one at 4th Street in Colorado Springs?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, i know which one you're talking about. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order a grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced Caffè Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk did you want in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, you want to order a grande iced cafe mocha with whole milk from starbucks on 4th street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, the total is $4.50. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. the order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt has been sent to your phone. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that would be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.
